data.name: Help_CmdLineArguments
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineBooleanOperators
data.value: /bo [True/False] -bo [True/False] -booleanOperators [True/False] 布尔运算操作 - True 或 False.
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineCaseSensitive
data.value: /cs [True/False] -cs [True/False] -caseSensitive [True/False] 大小写敏感 - True 或 False.
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineCSVReport
data.value: /csv [filePath] -csv [filePath] 搜索完成后输出搜索结果为CSV文件.
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineDefaultArguments
data.value: 任何未指定的参数将预设为最后保存过的用户设置.
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineDotAsNewline
data.value: /dn [True/False] -dn [True/False] -dotAsNewline [True/False] 设定点号作为新行 - True 或 False.
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineExample1
data.value: dnGrep [arguments] 使用下列任意组合参数. 举例: dnGrep /f "C:\Program Files\dnGrep" /pm *.txt;*.xml /s t\w*t /st Regex
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineExample2
data.value: dnGrep [folderPath] [searchFor] 一个或两个无 flag 参数: 第一个参数为搜索文件夹,第二个参数是搜索用正则表达式. 举例: dnGrep "C:\Program Files\dnGrep" t\w*t
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineExit
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineFolder
data.value: /f [folderPath] -f [folderPath] -folder [folderPath] 搜索文件夹, 可以是以逗号或分号分隔的多个路径.
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineHeader
data.value: dnGrep: 搜索纯文本文件, Word 和 Excel 文档, PDF, 压缩文件, 正则表达式, XPath, 以及注音查询.
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineMultiline
data.value: /ml [True/False] -ml [True/False] -multiline [True/False] 设定多行搜索 - True 或 False.
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLinePathToIgnore
data.value: /pi [pattern] -pi [pattern] -pathToIgnore [pattern] 搜索路径中的需要排除的文件名或文件夹模式匹配, 可以是以逗号或分号分隔的多个模式.
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLinePathToMatch
data.value: /pm [pattern] -pm [pattern] -pathToMatch [pattern] 搜索路径中的文件名模式匹配, 可以是以逗号或分号分隔的多个模式.
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLinePatternType
data.value: /pt [type] -pt [type] -patternType [type] 符合或忽略匹配的模式类型 - 必须为其一: "Asterisk" (通配符), "Regex" (正则表达式), 或 "Everything" (需安装 Everything 搜索软件).
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineReport
data.value: /rpt [filePath] -rpt [filePath] -report [filePath] 搜索完成后输出搜索结果为报告文件.
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineSearchFor
data.value: /s [searchFor] -s [searchFor] -searchFor [searchFor] 要搜索的模式内容或文本. 若给定此参数, 将自动开始搜索.
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineSearchType
data.value: /st [type] -st [type] -searchType [type] 搜索类型 - 必须为其一: "PlainText", "Regex" (正则表达式), "XPath", 或 "Soundex" (注音).
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineTextReport
data.value: /txt [filePath] -txt [filePath] -text [filePath] 搜索完成后输出搜索结果为文本文件.
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineUsage
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineVersion
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line: 0 is the installed dnGrep version number; 1 is the installed dnGrep build date

data.name: Help_CmdLineWholeWord
data.value: /ww [True/False] -ww [True/False] -wholeWord [True/False] 全字匹配 - True 或 False.
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.comment: Help dialog window title

data.comment: Help dialog button label

data.name: Help_OneOrMoreArgumentsAreInvalid
data.value: 一个或多个参数不合法.
data.comment: Help dialog header text

data.name: Help_CmdLineFileInformation
data.value: /fi [True/False] -fi [True/False] -fileInformation [True/False] 设置标志确定是否在报告输出中包含文件和行信息 - True 或 False。
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineListItemSeparator
data.value: /sep [separator character or text] -sep [separator character or text] -listItemSeparator [separator character or text] 设置字符或字符串以分隔报表输出中一行上的列表项。
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineReportMode
data.value: /rm [mode] -rm [mode] -reportMode [mode] 设置正则表达式报告的报告输出模式 - 必须是以下之一： "FullLine"、"Matches"或"Groups"。
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineTrimWhitespace
data.value: /trim [True/False] -trim [True/False] -trimWhitespace [True/False] 设置标志确定是否去掉报告输出中的空白 - True 或 False。
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineUniqueScope
data.value: /scope [scope] -scope [scope] -uniqueScope [scope] 设置标志以设定正则表达式报告输出中唯一值的范围 - 必须是以下之一："Global" 或 "PerFile"。
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineSeparateLines
data.value: /sl [True/False] -sl [True/False] -separateLines [True/False] 设置标志确定是否在正则表达式报告输出中的单独行上输出每个匹配项或组 - True 或 False。
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineUniqueValues
data.value: /unique [True/False] -unique [True/False] -uniqueValues [True/False] 设置标志确定是否在正则表达式报告输出中输出唯一匹配或组值 - True 或 False。
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line
